data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Guimaras to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guimaras, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Guimaras, Philippines to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Guimaras do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Guimaras.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Manobo, Cotabato people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Guimaras, Philippines.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 174,700 people living in Guimaras.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 24,335 believers in Guimaras, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
